r.d: PHP extension for reading RAR archives using bundled unRAR library.
r.n: - Merge changes made to unrar up to version 5.5.6. - Support PHP 7.0 and PHP 7.1. - Added functions RarEntry::getRedirType(), RarEntry::isRedirectToDirectory() and RarEntry::getRedirTarget(), as well as the following constants on RarEntry: FSREDIR_UNIXSYMLINK, FSREDIR_WINSYMLINK, FSREDIR_JUNCTION, FSREDIR_HARDLINK and FSREDIR_FILECOPY. - Changed stat handler to return UTC time for creation, modification and access time (does not work reliably on Windows). - Fix cloning of RarArchive being allowed.
